name: FaceppSDK
summary: Face++ is a new vision platform built by Megvii Inc. aiming at providing compact, powerful, and cross-platform vision service.
description: Face++ uses the cutting-edge technology of computer vision and data mining to provide 3 core vision services (Detection, Recognition, and Analysis). With the service and huge database of celebrity from Face++, the developers can apply the face technology into their own websites, mobile Apps, and smart TVs, increasing incredible user experience.
